basic.description:
An introduction to the guitar through class instruction. Fundamental note-playing and chording techniques to accompany singing will be emphasized. Includes the study of ranges, fingerings, transpositions, basic instrument maintenance, method books and teaching techniques. Students must provide their own instruments. 
NOTE    Enrolment is limited to students in a MUSC Plan or the B.Mus. Program.
basic.subject: MUSC
basic.title: Guitar Techniques & Methods

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prereqistration    Limited to registration in a MUSC Plan or the BMUS Program
